Articles.Content:
hmm, normally i get 60fps.. but when i set overlay on, i get really really low fps..

but when i just go IVA view.. it goes back normal fps..  

maybe too much internal objects..

**1.1.1 Testing is in progress.**

Can anyone give me the textbook definition of insanity?

> 
> 
> 24 minutes ago, YANFRET said:
> 
> 
> **1.1.1 Testing is in progress.**
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Can anyone give me the textbook definition of insanity?
> 

To repeatedly do the same thing expecting a different result ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif ";)")
Has anyone tried this in 1.1.2 yet?

> 
>

> 
> 
> **1.1.1 Testing is in progress.**
>

> 
> 
> Has anyone tried this in 1.1.2 yet?
> 

12 hours from now will someone ask this and say 1.1.3?

> 
> 
> 2 hours ago, YANFRET said:
> 
> 
> 12 hours from now will someone ask this and say 1.1.3?
> 

No kidding! At this point I'd just start sending them to ask "Mr Owl" Why ask when you can find out yourself in less time than it takes to post a comment asking about it.

> 
> 
> 3 hours ago, YANFRET said:
> 
> 
> 12 hours from now will someone ask this and say 1.1.3?
> 

What?!! 1.1.3 is out already?!!

![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif ":D")

> 
> 
> 23 minutes ago, V8jester said:
> 
> 
> No kidding! At this point I'd just start sending them to ask "Mr Owl" Why ask when you can find out yourself in less time than it takes to post a comment asking about it.
> 

I'm sorry I asked. I was on my phone yesterday and tried to find out quickly. I wasn't able to test it myself.

It's all good in the monkey hood. We're just venting. 

When 1.1234567 has been out for ten days we will have a flight solution for you! 

Really we are re working a few models that are our bad, everything will come together fine soon.

**keep finding bugs!**
75% real scale? These parts look amazing. I'm about to do a career with Kscale2. Just trying to figure out how this all scales. Would these part be overkill?

Yanfret aja y tu que? ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif ":sticktongue:")

I was looking for the Altair pod in the latest release and it's gone, so, being the stubborn guy I am, I've restored it from 1.0.5 but there's no working hatch, sooo again restored it from 1.0.4 but it slow downs the game a lot (may be colliders issues).  It's goodbye for ever?

aaaand do you know where can I get the darker texture for the NOS lander:

![6mYJwA.jpg](http://imagizer.imageshack.us/a/img537/664/6mYJwA.jpg)

Edit: Just found out reading the thread (yeah I know ..) " The manufacturer confirmed it is broken since our remake of the Altair for 1.0.5, a fix is pending. They have it taken apart on the factory floor right now. "

Thanks!!

Any progress?
The fairings wont seperate!

>

>

> The fairings wont seperate!
> 

It's not up to date right now! Expect lots of bugs ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

I simply love orion![![Screen Shot 2016-05-20 at 5.42.58 PM.png](http://Users/katarzynakutyla/Pictures/iPhoto%20Library.photolibrary/Masters/2016/05/20/20160520-175745/Screen%20Shot%202016-05-20%20at%205.42.58%20PM.png)](http://ksp)

> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> **This project is modeled at 75% real scale.**
> 

**What does this mean as far as stock interoperability? Is the SLS at 3.75m? 5? 7? Basically, does this align with KSP stock sizes or are they slightly bigger (or all bigger)?**
Bigger because KSP stock parts are set to 64% scale by default.

![LIGxEuS.png](http://i.imgur.com/LIGxEuS.png)<iframe class="imgur-album" frameborder="0" height="550" src="//imgur.com/a/" width="100%"></iframe>

here are some off the rockets i made

> 
> 2 hours ago, Delta\_8930 said:
> 
> 
> Bigger because KSP stock parts are set to 64% scale by default.
> 

So is there a possibility to rescale either one (stock or CMES parts) to make them compatible?

> 
> 
> 17 hours ago, MrMeeb said:
> 
> 
> It's not up to date right now! Expect lots of bugs ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")
> 

**Status Update**

**While you wait patiently for us to finish the 1.1.2.3.4.5.6.7.? update, you can replace the procedural fairings included with the 1.1 beta with this updated version: [https://github.com/e-dog/ProceduralFairings/releases](https://github.com/e-dog/ProceduralFairings/releases)** 

**Cool things are on the way, thanks for your interest and cooperation!**

> 
> 
> 1 hour ago, jordanjay29 said:
> 
> 
> So is there a possibility to rescale either one (stock or CMES parts) to make them compatible?
> 

Probably, but some of the parts in there were from really old mods that have issues when resized. I tried resizing the inflatable heat shields to stock sizes, but the stowed mesh that resulted was awful.

**Status Update**

While our prime contractor works out details on the all new NOS Chaka Lander **TM**, we put together some exciting new station craft for you guys
